price: 35.Kuma maqlayaan (Jannada) gudaheeda hadal macno darro ah ama wax been ah.
arabic: لَّا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوٗا وَلَا كِذَّٰبٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lā yasmaʿūna fīhā laghwan walā kidhāban
